tags.description: Semi exposed, undeveloped. Protected campsite at N end of bay. Pit toilet.
tags.description:landing: Moderate, surf, sand. Islets block swell.
tags.description:other: Water at creek. Not as attractive as the wide stretch of bay to the S, but more protected. Small paddler-built cabin for public use. Well-maintained (2013). Second cabin reported. Condition unknown.
tags.name: Burnett Bay North (BCMT)
